name: Save The Eggs
description:
You are a super protective hen that is determined to save as many eggs as possible. Help the hen save the most eggs and avoid the rats!

How To Play?

  • Collect the eggs to save them;
  • Use "A" and "D" to movement;
  • Use "W" to jump and "W + W" to double jump;
  • Use "S" in the air to get down faster;
  • Defeat the rats jumping on them.

Have fun!
